English: Since we have opened up more territories for colonization, people are rushing towards our ports
The kickstarted Biobio mining industry has been a boon to our wider economy
As we seek to strengthen ourselves economically, we seeked to modernize both our industry and farming. The reforms are taking effect
New machines, new equipment, and new training are yielding better productions!

The blood of a Saint flows in our King's veins.
Our King is a popular and prestigious figure.
